definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: Tirshathâ, title of Persian governor in Judaea, acc. to Mey:Entstehung d. Jud 194 al. = His Excellency (read Tarshathâ) otherwise Lag:Symm. i. 60 (cf. Arm, Stud. § § 280, 1680).—As Mey:l.c., Scheft 93 f. (tarsvta, the feared, revered) Moss:Hast. DB TIRSHATHA Che:Ency. Bib. ID.;—´[[הַתּ]]: Ezr 2:63 = Ne 7:65, Ne 7:69 (Baer Gi; v:Ne 7:70 van d. H.); of Nehemiah Ne 8:9, Ne 10:1.
